title: Taiwan Issues Arrest Warrant for OnePlus CEO in Crackdown on Tech Talent Poaching
full_text: Taiwan Issues Arrest Warrant for OnePlus CEO in Crackdown on Tech Talent Poaching. Prosecutors allege Pete Lau recruited dozens of Taiwanese engineers without proper government approval.. Taiwan just proved its not afraid to go after big names as it ramps up efforts to compete with China in the tech talent pool. Taiwanese authorities have issued an arrest warrant for OnePlus CEO Pete… [+2570 chars]
